article_title: Ike’s Place sacked: RFP cites survey, but students angry with process

og.description:
Four years after establishing itself as a campus landmark, Ike’s Place is leaving.

Last Friday, s...
og.title: Ike’s Place sacked: RFP cites survey, but students angry with process

twitter.description: On April 25, the University announced that Ike’s Place will be replaced by an eatery operated by Stanford Residential and Dining Enterprises (R&DE) in September. R&DE has not yet announced the details of its winning restaurant concept. In the meantime, students have been left to wonder how the decision to award the contract was made, who made it and why.
twitter.creator: @Stanford_Daily
twitter.title: Ike’s Place sacked: RFP cites survey, but students angry with process
